# Thu Le

> Personal website of Thu Le, a product designer based in Saigon, Vietnam.

Thu Le is a product designer who leads product design at Anduin, a B2B SaaS startup in the private markets space. She has been designing digital products for over six years.

This is her personal website where she shares writing on intentional living, productivity, tools, and everyday life.

## Main sections

- /about: About Thu, how to connect, and site colophon
- /blog: Personal essays and reflections
- /now: What she's currently focused on
- /uses: Tools and software she uses
- /links: Various links and resources
- /blogroll: Blogs she follows and recommends

## Notable posts

- /blog/personal-manifesto: Her guiding principles for life and work
- /blog/why-i-rebuilt-this-site: The story behind starting this blog
- /blog/how-i-track-my-work-and-life: Her productivity system and tools
- /blog/on-running: Reflections on running as a practice
- /blog/things-i-know: Hard-won lessons and beliefs
- /blog/50-things-i-learned-in-2025: Annual learnings roundup

## Contact

- Website: https://thu-le.com
- Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/thu-le.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/le-thu
